/api/v1/{genome}/clinvar.DESCRIPTION: gets all clinvar variants that match specified filtering parameters.

chrom.DESCRIPTION: specify chromosome name for data in the format of chr1-22|chrX|chrY, must be used with start, end, and location

start.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based start coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, end , and location

end.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based end coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, start, and location

location.DESCRIPTION: location = within | overlapping | exact . Must be used with chrom, start, and end.

clinvar_ids.DESCRIPTION: list of clinvar ids separated by comma(,)

sources.DESCRIPTION: list of sources separated by comma(,)

uids.DESCRIPTION: list of uids separated by comma(,)

/api/v1/{genome}/conservation.DESCRIPTION: gets all conservation elementsthat match specified filtering parameters.

chrom.DESCRIPTION: specify chromosome name for data in the format of chr1-22|chrX|chrY, must be used with start, end, and location

start.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based start coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, end , and location

end.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based end coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, start, and location

location.DESCRIPTION: location = within | overlapping | exact . Must be used with chrom, start, and end.

sources.DESCRIPTION: list of sources separated by comma(,)

uids.DESCRIPTION: list of uids separated by comma(,)

/api/v1/{genome}/copy_number_variants.DESCRIPTION: gets all copy number variants that match specified filtering parameters.

chrom.DESCRIPTION: specify chromosome name for data in the format of chr1-22|chrX|chrY, must be used with start, end, and location

start.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based start coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, end , and location

end.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based end coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, start, and location

location.DESCRIPTION: location = within | overlapping | exact . Must be used with chrom, start, and end.

uids.DESCRIPTION: list of uids separated by comma(,)

sources.DESCRIPTION: list of sources separated by comma(,)

clinical_assertion.DESCRIPTION: string matching clinical assertion to filter by

clinvar_accession.DESCRIPTION: string matching clinvar accession code to filter by

dbVar_accession.DESCRIPTION: string matching dbVar accession code to filter by

/api/v1/{genome}/genes.DESCRIPTION: get list of genes based off filtering parameters

chrom.DESCRIPTION: specify chromosome name for data in the format of chr1-22|chrX|chrY, must be used with start, end, and location

start.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based start coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, end , and location

end.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based end coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, start, and location

location.DESCRIPTION: location = within | overlapping | exact . Must be used with chrom, start, and end.

uids.DESCRIPTION: list of uids separated by comma(,)

sources.DESCRIPTION: list of sources separated by comma(,)

names.DESCRIPTION: list of gene symbols/names separated by comma(,)

/api/v1/{genome}/genes/symbols.DESCRIPTION: get list of all gene symbols

/api/v1/{genome}/short_tandem_repeats.DESCRIPTION: get list of short tandem repeats based off filtering parameters

chrom.DESCRIPTION: specify chromosome name for data in the format of chr1-22|chrX|chrY, must be used with start, end, and location

start.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based start coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, end , and location

end.DESCRIPTION: specify 1-based end coordinate for data, must be used with chrom, start, and location

location.DESCRIPTION: location = within | overlapping | exact . Must be used with chrom, start, and end.

sources.DESCRIPTION: list of sources separated by comma(,)

uids.DESCRIPTION: list of uids separated by comma(,)

motif.DESCRIPTION: a motif of bases to be queried

rotations.DESCRIPTION: boolean true or false to whether to check all rotations of specified motif

pathogenicity.DESCRIPTION: boolean true or false to whether to check all rotations of specified motif
